articles.author: Nikolay Kozhanov
articles.title: Russia's difficult balancing act between Iran and Israel
articles.description: Russia fears an escalation between Iran and Israel and wants to avoid it at any cost.
articles.content: On January 23, Russian President Vladimir Putin travelled to Israel to attend the commemoration of the 75th anniversary of the liberation of the Auschwitz-Birkenau concentration camp by Soviet forces. This was only his third official trip to the country since… [+8090 chars]

articles.author: Samira Sawlani
articles.title: How prepared is Africa for an outbreak of deadly coronavirus?
articles.description: No confirmed case on the continent yet but fears grow the deadly disease will reach countries with weak health systems.
articles.content:
Countries across Africa are ramping up measures to prevent an outbreak of a new coronavirus that has killed more than 250 in China and spread into several Asian countries, and as far afield as the United States, Europe and Australia.
As scientists race to fi… [+6560 chars]

articles.title: China: Covering the Coronavirus Contagion
articles.description: How the coronavirus outbreak in China became a messaging nightmare. Plus, Hong Kong's kidnapped bookseller.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: US bans travellers from China as coronavirus toll spikes
articles.description: Beijing criticises US move temporarily barring entry to most foreigners who had been in China in the past two weeks.
articles.content: The United States has declared a public health emergency and temporarily banned the entry of foreign nationals who travelled to China recently, joining a growing list of nations to impose travel restrictions due to the coronavirus outbreak that has killed mor… [+2260 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China coronavirus: Indonesia prepares to evacuate students
articles.description: Hundreds of Indonesian students will soon be airlifted out of Wuhan, which has been at the centre of a new coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
Indonesia prepares to receive hundreds of students who are being evacuated from China's Wuhan city, which has been at the centre of a new coronavirus outbreak.
All of them will be quarantined for two weeks and doctors say they are ready for their arrival.
D… [+246 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China coronavirus death toll surges: All the latest updates
articles.description: Top Communist Party official in Wuhan expresses 'remorse' because local authorities reacted too slow on the outbreak.
articles.content:
The death toll from China's coronavirus outbreak has surpassed 250, the government said on Saturday, as foreign nations tightened restrictions on travellers from China in response to the rapid spread of the illness.
